name: The Peter Principle
description:
Entry to the Ludum Dare 51 Compo: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/$303025

DESCRIPTION

  • Complete tasks around the office to score points before your next review…or get the boot.
  • Reviews happen every 10 seconds, so be sure to collect enough points.
  • Points will reset after each promotion, so don’t work too hard…

CONTROLS:

  • Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • In-Game Interactions: Use mouse
